summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3714 for the improvement of Denny Way, from 1st Avenue to 2nd Avenue; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 45644, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
